item.description:
On October 27th, Blues Cafe will bring you another classy night of swing & blues dancing, this time with costumes (if you want)! Since it’s the weekend before Halloween, wear your costume if you like! Or, get extra-classied-up — wear that tux or evening gown you’ve been waiting for an excuse to wear!

We’ll be dancing to the hot and cool tunes of the Michael Warren Quartet, a new Boston-based gypsy jazz band. And, blues dancers, never fear! They’ve got great slow tunes too! Julie Brown will be DJing the band breaks.

New to dancing? As usual, we’ll have a beginner-friendly lesson before the dance, also included in the price of admission. No partner or experience necessary : )

Lesson: 8-9pm
Dancing: 9-12:30am

Regular admission – $18
Students (w/ valid ID) – $15
*Lesson, coffee, tea, water, and snacks/pie are included in the price of admission

98 George P Hassett Dr
Medford, MA

group.name: The Boston-Area Swing/Blues Dance Meetup Group

item.name: October Blues Cafe – Dress-Up or Dress Up, Live music!
